automaton.name: TBK:NTW:CIS:R:C:Router Link Flapping V1.0
automaton.notes: Automation will handle Link flapping alert and diagnose the information. In case of false alarm, remediates the ticket.

EditVariableAction.script: var cmd = "show log | in " + month + " " + day + ".*(up|down)"; cmd;
getintip="show interfaces " + interfacename + " | in [iI]nternet address"; getintip;

"We have logged into the affected device and gathered initial troubleshooting information.
" + "
" + "We have determined the BGP neighbor(" + neighborip + ") is currently not found.
" + "
" + "This ticket will be picked up by the next available engineer.
" + "
" + "sh ip bgp sum : 
" + "======================================================
" + bgp_sum +"
" + "======================================================
